content:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Bartending position at your establishment. As a 21-year-old Korean woman with three years of experience working at Starbucks and currently in my second year studying Journalism at Toronto Metropolitan University, I am confident that my skills and passion for customer service will make me an excellent addition to your team.

During my time at Starbucks, I have honed my ability to multitask, work well under pressure, and provide top-notch customer service. I have also become proficient in managing cash, taking orders, and creating a welcoming and friendly environment for customers. My experience has taught me the importance of maintaining a clean and organized workspace while ensuring that all drinks are prepared to the highest standards.

As a student of Journalism, I have developed excellent communication and writing skills, which will allow me to engage with customers and provide them with an exceptional experience at your establishment. I understand the importance of being a team player, and I am eager to work collaboratively with your staff to ensure that every guest feels valued and satisfied.

In addition to my work experience and academic background, I am also passionate about mixology and enjoy experimenting with new recipes and techniques in my free time. I am confident that my enthusiasm for the craft will allow me to create unique and memorable drinks for your customers.

Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss my qualifications further and look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
